import React, { useLayoutEffect, useState } from "react"; import PostCover from "../../images/browseBanner.jpg"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import Skeleton, { SkeletonTheme } from "react-loading-skeleton"; export default function BlogDetails(props) { const params = useParams(); const [GetPost, setGetPost] = useState(""); const SkBgColor = getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue( "--skeleten-base-clr" ); const SkhighlightColor = getComputedStyle(document.body).getPropertyValue( "--skeleten-highlight-clr" ); const [IsLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); useLayoutEffect(() => { GetPostData(); }, []); async function GetPostData() { setIsLoading(true); await fetch("http://localhost:8000/api/get-post-data", { method: "post", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json", Authorization:`Bearer ${localStorage.getItem("token")}` }, body:JSON.stringify({"q":params.query}), }) .then((Response) => { return Response.json(); }) .then((Data) => { setIsLoading(false); setGetPost(Data.data); }) .catch((e) => { console.log(e); }); } return ( <>
Article
Posted 01 January 2022

Article
Posted 01 January 2022

The details are not the details, they make the design.

hat is HTML? HTML is an initialism for "HyperText Markup Language". It is the language of the web. It is used to create websites. It is used to define a page layout, meaning it is a barebone page structure. HTML is used for making pages of the website also called webpages that we see on the internet It consists of a set of tags. This set of tags is written in HTML Document. ".html" or ".htm" is the extension. There are so many versions of HTML but HTML5 is the latest version. Features of HTML It is platform-independent. Images, videos, and audio can be added to a web page. Hypertext can be added to the text. It is a markup language. It is interpreted language It can be integrated with other languages like CSS, JavaScript etc. Semantic Structure. local Storage & Indexed DB – Client-side data storage. Offline Capabilities (PWA) with Cache API & Service Workers. Features of HTML It is platform-independent. Images, videos, and audio can be added to a web page. Hypertext can be added to the text.
